metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3428 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability was found in coders/tiff.c in ImageMagick. This issue may allow a local attacker to trick the user into opening a specially crafted file, resulting in an application crash and denial of service.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
